text:
Hola!! ğŸ˜„ yaar kya hi likhe tmhare baare me from TA202 to CHE ke saare courses u were the constant jo har way me help karti thi and hmlog saare 4-5 log bas tmhare bhrose rhte the ki abha bata degi bas uske baad ho jaega (uske liye thanks) ğŸ™ƒğŸ™ƒ, warna proabably abhi bhi koi course kar rhe hote hm. Wo almost har course ke baare me rona dhona se leke profs ki bitching tak sab kar rakha hai hmlogo ne.... ğŸ˜…

Apart from acads bhi we resonated in more ways than one. CCD and Doaa ki coffee ke bahane bhi bhot hangout kara hai hmlogo ne saath me. Looking back I wish we watched a lot more movies together ek hi dekha hai aaj tak saath me, should have done that more ğŸ¤”ğŸ¤”. You were always easy to talk to and  u were one of the very few who actually used to listen to the problems instead of just shoving it off, u were also one of the very few i could talk to about almost anything.  Ab as a person tmhare baare me kya hi bol sakte hai chaapu to tm ho hi bas chaapte rhna and remain the kind hearted soul that u are. ğŸ™ƒğŸ™ƒ
No goodbyes i really hope to c u sooooon till then all the best 

(PS - photos le leni chahiye thi hmlogo ko aur sirf ta n class wali group photos hai apni ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£)
author: Ashutosh  Kumar

text:
Are (chutiya) Bihari...... 
First impression yaad hai mereko abhi bhi tmhara (Mera naam ABI-SEK hai)  ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Bol bolke aadat sudhaar diye honge hmlog sab 4 saal me ğŸ˜¬ . Probably tm department ke sabse phle dost hoge tm
aur upar se tm bihari nikal gaye sone pe suhaga ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£ ( hm bolke baat karne wala akela insaan mere alawa ) . Itna zada pareshaan karne wala insaan hai na tu matlab kya hi batae.ğŸ˜‘ğŸ˜‘. Bhot saari memories hai be tere saath matlab ameya ko saath me maarne se leke raat ko neend me roll khane jaana, ya koi bhi nayi movie aaye to bas z-square pohoch jaate the hm dono baaki koi aaye na aaye (mostly mai kheechke le jaata thağŸ˜…). Pure college me probably sabse zada berhmi se maara hai maine tereko tmhare bday pe ğŸ˜¤ğŸ‘€ğŸ˜¬( PS - i don't regret it tmne bhi bhot maara tha bhot hi zada ).Ek do random memories ye bhi hai ki tune mereko mere 1st year room ke khidki se kudaya tha ğŸ™„
gate lock karke chale gaye the mera( maine tmhare NCC wale day badla le liya tha ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜),  plus wo eso 208 ki class ko pubg me convert kar dena ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£. Rha baat course wagera ka to usme to mostly ek jaisa haal hi rhta tha sab anshuman bharose ğŸ¤¡. Bhai ye covid ka mid sem end sem ko kabhi nhi bhulenge hm lectures bina dekhe itne zada number aaye the jitne padhke bhi nhi aaya aaj tak college me . Plus tmne jo courses me aur projects me fraud maara hai na wo mere se better to koi nhi jaanta, kisiko bata diya to abhi bhi watt lag jaegi teri. Yaar ab pure 4 years ka to nhi likh paenge bhot zada memories hai, But jaisa chutiya jaisa trust karta hai na tu merepe bhot kam log karte the waisa same trust college me log mere upar ğŸ™ƒğŸ™ƒ, ig uske liye thanks (ab zada udd mat bhot pit jaega ğŸ˜ˆ). Aur aise bhi company jaane ke baad agar galti se bhi bhul gaya mereko ya ignore mara to tab to tm bhi jaante ho aur mai bhi jaanta hu ki kya hoga tere saath plus ab tm itne mote ho gaye ho ki bhaag bhi nhi paoge mereseğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. All the best goodluck ya bye nhi bolne wale hm tereko bhad me jaa wo inn logo ke liye hai jinse baat nhi hone wali aur terese itni formality bhai kaun hi karega. Chal baaki wahtaapp kar dena kuch baat hua to call to mai nhi uthaunga ek baari me ğŸ˜¬....
author: Ashutosh  Kumar

text:
apne wing ka bahubali... (thoda zada izzat wala nickname pad gaya hai tera ğŸ˜¶) .Pata wo first year me agar saath me pura aero summer project fraud nhi maara hota na to maybe aaj itne ache dost nhi hoteğŸ˜…. pure 1st year tmse kam hi jaan phchaan hui thi lekin summers ke baad bhot ache se jaan liye bhot bade nalayak hoğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£. Plus admist covid goa ğŸ¤© happened to bas ab aur kya chahiyeğŸ™ƒ. A word of advice unknown logo ke saath galti  se bhi drink mat kar lena bilkul control me nhi rhte
ğŸ™„ğŸ™„. Tune aur hitesh ne hi shuru kara tha ye behna behna wala harkat ğŸ˜ğŸ˜‘ chal maaf kiya. Althogh tm emotional fool ho but at the end of the day bhot acha insaan hai yaar tu. Hopefully ye pandemic ke baad phirse sab saath me chal sake kahinğŸ¤ğŸ».... All the best for your future endevours (ye line formality thi ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜› maybe common bhi mil jaye doosre kisi meğŸ¤«) Nonetheless hope to cu soon.....ğŸ™ƒ

text: Broo !! ğŸ™ƒ  thoda late ho gaya likhne me tmhara  memoir ğŸ˜… . I couldn't agree any more we resonate with each other so much when it comes to hobbies  ğŸ¤©. In my entire stay at iitk i didn't meet any other person  jo koi diary maintain karta ho ya karta tha past me (it was just the two of us ) .Plus u  came across as a very nice and chill guy to hang out with and apne text messages koi padhle to bechare ko kuch samjh na aaye aise switch hote the hmare topics. And how can i forget u have gotten damn good when it comes to animation ğŸ˜ğŸ˜. I am really glad that our paths crossed.,here's to hoping to c u in good health soon all the best till then...... cheers ğŸ¥‚

text: Namaste shukla ji !! Apni baat ache se hona to TA 201 me shuru hui thi . Bhai kya fraud maara hai uss ek canon ko banane me hmlogo ne XD. Academically to obviously tm bhot chappu  ho hi bas chaapte rhna aur kya . Here's to a bright future ahead good luck... cheers ğŸ¥‚

text:
Man!! writing your memoir was one of the 2 toughest ones (u can guess the othe one ğŸ˜… ). I am pretty sure neither one of us know how tf or when we met and how we ended up becoming such good friends ğŸ™ƒ (friends would be an understatement idc ğŸ‘€ ). We actually don't have anything in common lol ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£ (now that's something). It was only later that we found out about the mutual love about movies and food (chick blast, dominos, chocolate room pretty sure we have tried 
every item on all of those menus plus zomato ğŸ¤¤ğŸ¤© ). We even tried playing tennis which ended up with knee pain a lot of it ğŸ™„ and how can i forget that dedication towards basketball ğŸ€ i mean i got better because of it. Plus damn dude u are so bad with emotions i mean i am bad u are way 
worse than me. Plus u gotta come up with better justification for your caffeine addiction â˜•. That being said u are also one the most energectic people i have come across in college. And thanks for 
being such a positive influence on me and motivating everyone around you ğŸ™ƒğŸ™ƒ.  Don't change the kind hearted soul that u are (maybe u can learn how to talk to people of ur brother's age ğŸ˜‚ ) . We should go on trip soon ğŸ¤ğŸ»
I tried to keep it short since u specifically mentioned not to write your memoir ğŸ˜¶. All the best dude and m pretty sure u are gonna make all of those unreal ambitions come true and miss u broooo â¤ï¸â¤ï¸.  
Wanted to end it  by saying Something Cool ğŸ˜
(PS - WE ARE NOT AI BOTS u n solely u fall under that category :P ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜›)
author: Ashutosh  Kumar

text: Pandaaaaa ( the name suits you in more ways than one ğŸ˜¬ ) ... at leat kahin to tennis wali dp nhi hai ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£. I actually don't remember phli baar kab baat hui thi hmlog ki but m glad ho gayi thi ğŸ™ƒ cuz I am pretty sure during the first year before we got into our departments tm academically sabse badi help the mere ğŸ˜…, Especially that disaster of Phy (102 n 103 ğŸ™„) wo dono subjects paar hue the almost solely cuz of tmne jo padhaya tha ğŸ‘€(which mostly included ye saare examples rat lo ğŸ˜¶). Raat ko 2-3 baje zor zor se thok rhe hote the tmhara gate and anjesh pura irritate ho jaata tha. Even after jab depts me chale gaye then we started haning out a lot more (mostly cuz of pubg and cards but that still counts) ğŸ˜¬. Emotionally i never got to know u but then again maybe that's for the best idk ğŸ¤·ğŸ»â€â™‚ï¸. Plus jitna zada introverted rhte ho tm start me utna hi zada baat karte ho once u get to know someone (kinda like me) and get comfortable around them. You are sort of a really fun person to be around. I think bihari ke baad sabse zada tmhare saath hi theatre me movies dekhi hai maine (5 large coke wala disaster ğŸ˜µ). You are also one of the people jo honestly apna opinions de deta hai as to what i should do and what i shouldn't (really appreciate that ğŸ™ƒğŸ™ƒğŸ™ƒ).Anyway saare specific memories likhne gaye  to bhot lambi story ban jaegi and most probably knowing you tm padhoge bhi nhi ğŸ‘€... All the best for your future endevours (ye to likhna hi padta)...... Really hope to c us soon n let's go travel someplace when all of this is over ğŸ˜Š
